verses.niv: 15 "If you love me, you will obey what I command.
verses.kjv: 15 If ye love me, keep my commandments.
verses.esv: 15 “If you love me, you will keep my commandments.

verses.niv: 29 Peter and the other apostles replied: "We must obey God rather than men!
verses.kjv: 29 Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said, We ought to obey God rather than men.
verses.esv: 29 But Peter and the apostles answered, “We must obey God rather than men.

verses.niv: 14 As obedient children, do not conform to the evil desires you had when you lived in ignorance.
verses.kjv: 14 As obedient children, not fashioning yourselves according to the former lusts in your ignorance:
verses.esv: 14 As obedient children, do not be conformed to the passions of your former ignorance,

verses.niv: 3 This is love for God: to obey his commands. And his commands are not burdensome,
verses.kjv: 3 For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments: and his commandments are not grievous.
verses.esv: 3 For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments. And his commandments are not burdensome.

verses.niv: 19 If you are willing and obedient, you will eat the best from the land;
verses.kjv: 19 If ye be willing and obedient, ye shall eat the good of the land:
verses.esv:
19   If you are willing and obedient,
    you shall eat the good of the land;

verses.niv: 46 "Why do you call me, 'Lord, Lord,' and do not do what I say?
verses.kjv: 46 And why call ye me, Lord, Lord, and do not the things which I say?
verses.esv: 46 “Why do you call me ‘Lord, Lord,’ and not do what I tell you?

verses.niv: 22 If you listen carefully to what he says and do all that I say, I will be an enemy to your enemies and will oppose those who oppose you.
verses.kjv: 22 But if thou shalt indeed obey his voice, and do all that I speak; then I will be an enemy unto thine enemies, and an adversary unto thine adversaries.
verses.esv: 22 “But if you carefully obey his voice and do all that I say, then I will be an enemy to your enemies and an adversary to your adversaries.

verses.niv: 30 I have chosen the way of truth; I have set my heart on your laws.
verses.kjv: 30 I have chosen the way of truth: thy judgments have I laid before me.
verses.esv:
30   I have chosen the way of faithfulness;
    I set your rules before me.

verses.niv: 31 but the world must learn that I love the Father and that I do exactly what my Father has commanded me. "Come now; let us leave.
verses.kjv: 31 But that the world may know that I love the Father; and as the Father gave me commandment, even so I do. Arise, let us go hence.
verses.esv: 31 but I do as the Father has commanded me, so that the world may know that I love the Father. Rise, let us go from here.

verses.niv: 6 He held fast to the LORD and did not cease to follow him; he kept the commands the LORD had given Moses.
verses.kjv: 6 For he clave to the LORD, and departed not from following him, but kept his commandments, which the LORD commanded Moses.
verses.esv: 6 For he held fast to the LORD. He did not depart from following him, but kept the commandments that the LORD commanded Moses.

verses.niv: 24 Those who obey his commands live in him, and he in them. And this is how we know that he lives in us: We know it by the Spirit he gave us.
verses.kjv: 24 And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him, and he in him. And hereby we know that he abideth in us, by the Spirit which he hath given us.
verses.esv: 24 Whoever keeps his commandments abides in God, and God in him. And by this we know that he abides in us, by the Spirit whom he has given us.

verses.niv: 51 I tell you the truth, if anyone keeps my word, he will never see death."
verses.kjv: 51 Verily, verily, I say unto you, If a man keep my saying, he shall never see death.
verses.esv: 51 Truly, truly, I say to you, if anyone keeps my word, he will never see death.”

verses.niv: 28 He replied, "Blessed rather are those who hear the word of God and obey it."
verses.kjv: 28 But he said, Yea rather, blessed are they that hear the word of God, and keep it.
verses.esv: 28 But he said, “Blessed rather are those who hear the word of God and keep it!”

verses.niv: 23 but I gave them this command: Obey me, and I will be your God and you will be my people. Walk in all the ways I command you, that it may go well with you.
verses.kjv: 23 But this thing commanded I them, saying, Obey my voice, and I will be your God, and ye shall be my people: and walk ye in all the ways that I have commanded you, that it may be well unto you.
verses.esv: 23 But this command I gave them: ‘Obey my voice, and I will be your God, and you shall be my people. And walk in all the way that I command you, that it may be well with you.’

verses.niv: 60 I will hasten and not delay to obey your commands.
verses.kjv: 60 I made haste, and delayed not to keep thy commandments.
verses.esv:
60   I hasten and do not delay
    to keep your commandments.

verses.niv: 23 Jesus replied, "If anyone loves me, he will obey my teaching. My Father will love him, and we will come to him and make our home with him.
verses.kjv: 23 Jesus answered and said unto him, If a man love me, he will keep my words: and my Father will love him, and we will come unto him, and make our abode with him.
verses.esv: 23 Jesus answered him, “If anyone loves me, he will keep my word, and my Father will love him, and we will come to him and make our home with him.

verses.niv: 22 Do not merely listen to the word, and so deceive yourselves. Do what it says. 23 Anyone who listens to the word but does not do what it says is like a man who looks at his face in a mirror 24 and, after looking at himself, goes away and immediately forgets what he looks like. 25 But the man who looks intently into the perfect law that gives freedom, and continues to do this, not forgetting what he has heard, but doing it--he will be blessed in what he does.
verses.kjv: 22 But be ye doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving your own selves. 23 For if any be a hearer of the word, and not a doer, he is like unto a man beholding his natural face in a glass: 24 For he beholdeth himself, and goeth his way, and straightway forgetteth what manner of man he was. 25 But whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty, and continueth therein, he being not a forgetful hearer, but a doer of the work, this man shall be blessed in his deed.
verses.esv: 22 But be doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving yourselves. 23 For if anyone is a hearer of the word and not a doer, he is like a man who looks intently at his natural face in a mirror. 24 For he looks at himself and goes away and at once forgets what he was like. 25 But the one who looks into the perfect law, the law of liberty, and perseveres, being no hearer who forgets but a doer who acts, he will be blessed in his doing.

verses.niv: 8 And being found in appearance as a man, he humbled himself and became obedient to death--even death on a cross!
verses.kjv: 8 And being found in fashion as a man, he humbled himself, and became obedient unto death, even the death of the cross.
verses.esv: 8 And being found in human form, he humbled himself by becoming obedient to the point of death, even death on a cross.

verses.niv: 19 For just as through the disobedience of the one man the many were made sinners, so also through the obedience of the one man the many will be made righteous.
verses.kjv: 19 For as by one man’s disobedience many were made sinners, so by the obedience of one shall many be made righteous.
verses.esv: 19 For as by the one man’s disobedience the many were made sinners, so by the one man’s obedience the many will be made righteous.

verses.niv: 1 Praise the LORD. Blessed is the man who fears the LORD, who finds great delight in his commands.
verses.kjv: 1 Praise ye the LORD. Blessed is the man that feareth the LORD, that delighteth greatly in his commandments.
verses.esv:
112:1    Praise the LORD!
  Blessed is the man who fears the LORD,
    who greatly delights in his commandments!

verses.niv: 21 Whoever has my commands and obeys them, he is the one who loves me. He who loves me will be loved by my Father, and I too will love him and show myself to him."
verses.kjv: 21 He that hath my commandments, and keepeth them, he it is that loveth me: and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father, and I will love him, and will manifest myself to him.
verses.esv: 21 Whoever has my commandments and keeps them, he it is who loves me. And he who loves me will be loved by my Father, and I will love him and manifest myself to him.”

verses.niv: 5 Now if you obey me fully and keep my covenant, then out of all nations you will be my treasured possession. Although the whole earth is mine,
verses.kjv: 5 Now therefore, if ye will obey my voice indeed, and keep my covenant, then ye shall be a peculiar treasure unto me above all people: for all the earth is mine:
verses.esv: 5 Now therefore, if you will indeed obey my voice and keep my covenant, you shall be my treasured possession among all peoples, for all the earth is mine;

verses.niv: 9 and, once made perfect, he became the source of eternal salvation for all who obey him
verses.kjv: 9 And being made perfect, he became the author of eternal salvation unto all them that obey him;
verses.esv: 9 And being made perfect, he became the source of eternal salvation to all who obey him,

verses.niv: 14 You are my friends if you do what I command.
verses.kjv: 14 Ye are my friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you.
verses.esv: 14 You are my friends if you do what I command you.

verses.niv: 44 I will always obey your law, for ever and ever.
verses.kjv: 44 So shall I keep thy law continually for ever and ever.
verses.esv:
44   I will keep your law continually,
    forever and ever,
